flawed_nl_solution:
He gave 3/3=<<3/3=1>>1 box away
So he has 3-1=<<3-1=6>>6 boxes
So he got 6*20=<<6*20=120>>120 burritos
He ate 3*10=<<3*10=30>>30 burritos
So he has 120-30=<<120-30=90>>90 burritos left
#### 90

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2, not 6. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
